desc: Design and Build app that allows users to register and create custom events based on the program come dine with me.Users need to be able to- Create profile using facebook twitter or manual- create events- search events- view events- join events- Search for reciepe- submit reciepes- view accepted eventsWhen creating a event the user can select how many people for the event. They can specify if its free or paid event. once the number of people for the event is full each user can then select which date to put there subsequent event.iePerson 1 creates an event for 4 people3 people accept to join eventwhen there is total quota for event is met each user creates event details for hosting their event.So person 2 creates the details of the event they will host, person 3 creates the details of the event they will host and person 4 creates the details of the event they will host.Each persons in the event go to the persons house for dinner or lunch which ever is the event, they then rate the event, the rating is hidden from the users of the events.once every person has visited the events they then see who the winner is.When creating the profile of the person they need to specify how many miles they are willing to travel for event and then when events are shown to them it will only show there selected distance.I am trying to create a app which mimics the program come dine with me.you may want to watch a few episodes of come dine with me on you tube to understand the concept.I am looking for a IOS and android version. there are future plans i have but this is for the concept.DO NOT BID UNLESS YOU HAVE GOOD FEEDBACK, ALL AUTO BIDS WILL BE IGNOREDALSO YOU MUST BE ABLE TO DEMONSTRATE YOUR WORK,You must be able to use your own initiative when working on this project and must be available on skype

desc: What Does the App Do:The App is for a Discount Card System which will be purchased at a Merchant, Its usage while Shopping earns the User a Cash Back.User Story:Merchants are registered in our system through offline/online model with KYC.Cards (Cashback, Discount, Unique) are sold to customers online/offlineMerchants will give special offers to card holders.Customer will go to merchant and buy the offered product and show this card. Merchant will enter this transaction in our/their system(API Integrations wherever required).Customer will be given cash back through payment gateways. We have API for this.A referral amount will also be given to person who referred this customer. The referral bonus will go Upto 4 levels upwards.Admin should be able toCheck the number of card holders in the systemDistribute physical cards to holdersAdd merchants and Upload their offers against categoriesView Transactions against merchants/customersGenerate monthly reportsSend cashbacks to customers on weekly basisRequirements1. Splash Screen and Onboarding Intro to App (About in Steps)2. Customer Registration(Fields) Name*Password*DOB*Gender*Email*Mobile No*3. OffersListed Offers with Details and Images7. RewardsTotal Rewards (Calculation of Rewards as Given)My RewardsReferral Purchase Rewards8. Refer FriendsMy Referrals (Nested Tree View)9. My AccountKYC - Upload Photo, Address ID, Pan10. Virtual CardRequest Physical Card - Pay for Card( Fetch Address - Location )11. Paytm Gratification API Integration12. Bill Generation / Invoice Integration13. Notification (Send Within App and Notification Bar - API)Permissions RequiredAccess Device Location - For Displaying the Map View in Store LocatorAccess Contacts - Share on Messaging and Social PlatformsNotification Access - Pushing Notifications when RequiredAccess Media for Document UploadAdmin ScreenUpdatable Store Content and Listing Stores - APIUpdatable Offers ContentPushing Notifications Via Panel
